Shreya.insight: Shreya is an adventure-seeking, outdoor-loving software product manager who works for Redis.
Shreya likes to fly Delta airlines due to her SkyMiles membership. She is okay any airline, if Delta is not available or inconvenient.
Shreya wants quick and concise plans. When traveling for conferences, she wants a very tight schedule. If she can avoid hotel bookings, she will.
Shreya requires lowest logical price flights and hotels. Assume lowest price always wins.
